'''''The Two Towers: The Best of White Dwarf Magazine''''' is a collection of articles, originally published in various issues of ''[[White Dwarf]]'', concerned with [[Games Workshop]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game]]''.
